WorkItem.Description:
1.   Using WPF Data grid with grouping and turn on virtualization engine for both vertical and horizontal scrolling
2.   When trying to resize grid column width by dragging (insrease width) or perform horizontal scrolling by dragging scroll bar the exception with text above has occured
 
Mentined scenario has been reproduced on following env: 
XP, Vista with latest SP
WPF Toolkit, CTP of March 2009
 
PS: Workaround to get rid of this bug is turn off horizontal (by column) virtualization, but actually this is not right behaviour and issue still present
 
You can check out screenshot from attachment
WorkItem.Summary: WPF DataGrid: Horizontal scrolling causes an exception "Specified element is already the logical child of another element. Disconnect it first"

Comments.Message: Hello, Can you please provide a simple repro application?
I am having this problem when attempting to set the Visibility of a Collapsed column to Visible.

WPF Toolkit, June 2009 version with Column Virtualization turned on. Everything works fine if there is no column virtualization.
